summary: Andre Laurent, the captain of a tugboat, married Yvonne ten years ago. She has a heart disease but does not want to tell him. She dreams he quits the job for they can live quietly.
cast: Jean Gabin|Madeleine Renaud|Michèle Morgan|Charles Blavette|Jean Marchat|Nane Germon|Jean Dasté|René Bergeron|Henri Poupon|Anne Laurens|Marcel Pérès|Marcel Duhamel|Henri Pons|Sinoël|Fernand Ledoux|Léonce Corne|Lucien Coëdel|Henri Crémieux|Alain Cuny|Robert Dhéry|Marc Doelnitz|Geller|Robert Le Ray|Georges Malkine|Marcel Melrac|Raymone|Max Rogerys|Paul Violette
title: Remorques
